content.description: A long sport climb up a steep feature wide dike.
content.protection: Bolts to a bolted anchor.  Quick draws only.  Eight bolts to a bolted anchor.
content.location: Located on a large formation due south of the formation w/Bortemus.

content.description: This route climbs up a pointy slabby formation.
content.location: Located on the backside of the formation w/Bortemus.   Hike west past Bortemus and then south around the corner. Once on the backside, hike back east and you will see the route Stucco on a small pointy separate rib of rock.  Slab up past 4 bolts to a bolted anchor.

content.description: Slab climbing. Crux is low, the climb eases off as you climb higher. Somewhat poor rock quality. As of December 2018, the bolts on this route are bad for a few reasons. The rap rings are hollow, almost none of the bolts are stainless steel and none of the bolts are painted to match the rock. If you are bolting in Joshua Tree please know the rules and bolt safely.
content.location: Up behind Iceberg Boulder to the west.

content.description: This is a very run out slab/face climb directly next to (left) Slippery Slope. Lead wouldnt be terrible as the 5.6 moves are protected but if you blew it in between the bolts, you would not be happy (or alive).. Worth a TR burn if you're there. Much better when you take your shoes off and go barefoot.
content.protection: 3 bolts. Same 2 bolt anchor/rings as slippery slope
content.location: Directly next to slippery slope. You will only see 1 bolt from the ground.

content.description: A fun safe bolted sport climb in a cool location.
content.protection: Six bolts and two fixed pins to a bolted anchor.
content.location: Located on the backside (south side) of the rock with Bortemus.  Hike west past Bortemus, turn the corner to the south, and then head back east to a notch...hike up to the notch and you will see Kat's Meow on the south face of this large formation.

content.description: TWo bolts lead to a crack.
content.protection: Quick draws for the bolts and a small selection of cams will get you to the top   (one small, one med, one larger will probably do)...
content.location: Located just left of the climb Pretty Woman.
